newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian man finds lake of mercury in his garden.
newsitem.headline: Russian man finds lake of mercury in his garden.

text.p: A Russian man digging a pit in his garden to build a garage found a "lake of mercury" there, Izvestiya newspaper said on Friday.

Alexander Zavarukhin, who lives in a village near the Urals city of Chelyabinsk, called on civil emergency volunteers who in two operations extracted 180 kg (400 pounds) of the highly toxic substance from the earth in his garden.
Izvestiya said the mercury may have filtered into the soil from a local coalmine, but did not elaborate.
Local officials were not immediately available for comment on the report.
